column4: Hey, I am having an issue with my computer crashing about every 2 hours. I have reinstalled video card drivers (nvidia), and have now went back to default drivers (horrible res), but it is still happening
Can anyone give me some guidance into what files to look into to figure out what is going on ?
that highly depends on what you want to debugg
you can exclude the graphic card driver by looking into "/var/log/Xorg.0.log"
